citations.narrative:
A Contingency Plan has been documented for the facility, however there is no documentation verifying that annual
reviews are being conducted as required. The facility must review the plan on an annual basis, and the date of review and
plan revisions, if any, must be documented. The facility must correct this issue.
*****Correct by June 1, 2025 or the next meeting of the IACUC
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(2) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
A Contingency Plan has been documented for the facility, however there is no documentation verifying that annual 
reviews are being conducted as required. The facility must review the plan on an annual basis, and the date of review and 
plan revisions, if any, must be documented. The facility must correct this issue.  
*****Correct by June 1, 2025 or the next meeting of the IACUC 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
